fields.name: Basic
fields.description: Perfect for personal use. Enjoy essential features at an affordable price.  Basic storage, standard support, and access to core features.

fields.name: Premium
fields.description: Enhanced features and increased comfort. More storage, priority support, access to premium content, and exclusive features. Optimal value for your money!

fields.name: Enterprise
fields.description: The solution for businesses of all sizes. Maximum productivity and a personalized approach. Unlimited storage, personal manager, advanced analytics, and custom solutions.
